Description_lang: |cFF00ccffThe War Within Pet|r|n|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Pet|r|n|nUnlocks the Happy pet. In Plunderstorm, Da'kash Grimledger can summon your pet for you.|n|n"He's just excited to be here."

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Pet|r|n|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Pet|r|n|nUnlocks the Bubbles pet. In Plunderstorm, Da'kash Grimledger can summon your pet for you.|n|n"It followed you home!"|n|n|cFFFFFFFFBonus Pet: Pinchy|r|n|n|CFFa335eeClassic Pet|r|n|nUnlocks the Pinchy the Plunderer pet in Cataclysm: Classic.|n|n"Watch out for the pointy end!"
|cFF00ccffThe War Within Pet|r|n|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Pet|r|n|nUnlocks the Glamrok pet. In Plunderstorm, Da'kash Grimledger can summon your pet for you.|n|n"A fellow loot enthusiast."

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Pet|r
|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Pet|r

Unlocks the Sparklesnap pet. In Plunderstorm, Da'kash Grimledger can summon your pet for you.

"Snapping up anything that sparkles is a lifestyle."
|cFF00ccffThe War Within Mount|r|n|nUnlocks the Silver Tidestallion underwater mount.|n|n"It smells like shrimp."
|cFF00ccffThe War Within Mount|r|n|nUnlocks the Royal Seafeather flying mount.|n|n"With the amount of plunder you have, it'd be a crime not to have a giant parrot."

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Mount|r|n|nUnlocks the Polly Roger dragonriding mount.|n|n"The captain has granted you his very own giant tempermental parrot. Good Luck!"|n|n|cFFFFFFFFBonus Mount: Polly Roger|r|n|n|CFFa335eeClassic Mount|r|n|nUnlocks the Polly Roger flying mount in Cataclysm: Classic.
|cFF00ccffThe War Within Mount|r|n|nUnlocks the Plunderlord's Midnight Crocolisk mount.|n|n"A luxurious seat made of high quality black leather."
|cFF00ccffThe War Within Pet|r|n|n|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Pet|r Unlocks the Parley pet. In Plunderstorm, Da'kash Grimledger can summon your pet for you.|n|n"Ironically, not big on negotiating."

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Appearance|r|n|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Appearance|r|n|nUnlocks the Deadly Dagger appearance. To change appearances in Plunderstorm, see Da'kash Grimledger.|n|n"You're in Keg Leg's Crew now, swabbie. Here's your dagger, get to plundering!"

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Appearance|r|n|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Appearance|r|n|nUnlocks the Blacksteel Saber appearance. To change appearances in Plunderstorm, see Da'kash Grimledger.|n|n"Forged for swarthy swashbuckling action."

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Appearance|r|n|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Appearance|r|n|nUnlocks the Bloody Iron Cleaver appearance. To change appearances in Plunderstorm, see Da'kash Grimledger.|n|n"A bloody axe for a bloody good pirate!"

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Appearance|r|n|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Appearance|r|n|nUnlocks the Calcified Claymore appearance. To change appearances in Plunderstorm, see Da'kash Grimledger.|n|n"A sword is like a dagger, but larger."

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Appearance|r|n|n|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Appearance|r Unlocks the Swabbie's Shovel appearance. To change appearances in Plunderstorm, see Da'kash Grimledger.|n|n"Can you dig it?"

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Appearance|r
|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Appearance|r

Unlocks the Plunderlord's Tricorne of Admiralty appearance. Part of the Strapping Swabbie outfit in Plunderstorm. To change outfits, see Da'kash Grimledger once all appearances in this set are unlocked.

"A fine plumed helm made in just the right size for your head."

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Mount|r

Unlocks the Hooktalon flying mount.

"After just one ride, you'll be hooked!"

|cFF00ccffThe War Within Friend|r|n|cFF1eff00Plunderstorm Friend|r|n|nWhen summoned, Pepe will now sometimes be dressed as a Plunderlord. To summon the tiny captain in Plunderstorm, see Da'kash Grimledger.
